resources.string: Click on the \'Create Game\' button from the main menu
Choose a name for your game
Confirm your choices by pressing the \'Create Game\' button
After being transferred to the game lobby, you\'ll see a code at the top off the screen.
Share this code with the people you want to play with.
Click on the \'Join Game\' button from the main menu
Choose a game from the list of games or join by inputting the game code
Join the game by pressing the \'Join Game\' button
Wait for all player slots to be filled to start the game
Each round, players will be assigned as drawers or guessers

If you\'re a drawer, choose a word or phrase to draw from three options, each with different difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard). Drawers earn points each time a guesser guesses correctly, with harder words earning more points.
During the round, each player gets one turn to draw
You can modify the pencil\'s size and color as well as undo strokes
Guessers input their guesses in a text field to guess the word being drawn. Guessers earn more points the earlier they guess correctly in the turn
Each round lasts for 1 minute, and the remaining time is displayed at the top of the screen
After a round, a new drawing player is selected for the next round
After all players have drawn once, a leaderboard displays ranking each player by points
After 6 seconds, the next round automatically begins
After all players have drawn once, the game is over
An error occurred while creating the game. Please try again or restart the app if the issue persists.
Something went wrong. Please try again or restart the game.
You have successfully entered the game room
The game room is already full
Something went wrong. Please try again or restart the app.
Waiting for more players to join!
Waiting for %1$s to choose a word to draw
Player that will draw this round:
